featured.text: Extra virgin oil, the finest grade, is made from the first pressing of the olives and has a very low acidity rate (under 1%).
It is also a first pressing, but has a slightly higher acidity level (under 2%).

definition.zh_def: 酸性，指物質的酸性程度或特性。
definition.en_def: The quality of being acidic, often measured by pH levels.
definition.example: The acidity of the lemon juice makes it taste sour.
